documentation.text: There is already a higher or equal bid.
The auction has not ended yet.
The function auctionEnd has already been called.

Create a simple auction with `biddingTime`
 seconds bidding time on behalf of the
 beneficiary address `beneficiaryAddress`.

Bid on the auction with the value sent
 together with this transaction.
 The value will only be refunded if the
 auction is not won.
Withdraw a bid that was overbid.

End the auction and send the highest bid
 to the beneficiary.
There is already a higher or equal bid.
The auction has not ended yet.
The function auctionEnd has already been called.

Create a simple auction with `biddingTime`
 seconds bidding time on behalf of the
 beneficiary address `beneficiaryAddress`.

Bid on the auction with the value sent
 together with this transaction.
 The value will only be refunded if the
 auction is not won.
Withdraw a bid that was overbid.

End the auction and send the highest bid
 to the beneficiary.

AuctionEndAlreadyCalled().notice: The function auctionEnd has already been called.

AuctionNotYetEnded().notice: The auction has not ended yet.

BidNotHighEnough(uint256).notice: There is already a higher or equal bid.

auctionEnd().notice: End the auction and send the highest bid to the beneficiary.

bid().notice: Bid on the auction with the value sent together with this transaction. The value will only be refunded if the auction is not won.

constructor.notice: Create a simple auction with `biddingTime` seconds bidding time on behalf of the beneficiary address `beneficiaryAddress`.

withdraw().notice: Withdraw a bid that was overbid.
